perturbation.original_text: UTK shall be, and in all respects be deemed to be, an independent contractor in the performance of its duties hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: UTK shall be considered a general service provider in the performance of its duties hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'independent contractor' to 'general service provider' introduces ambiguity. The term 'independent contractor' has specific legal implications regarding liability and tax obligations. 'General service provider' is vague, potentially blurring the lines and leading to disputes over responsibilities under labor laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Common Law Definition of Independent Contractor vs. Employee

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may attempt to terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days consideration notice.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'written notice' to 'consideration notice' introduces ambiguity. 'Written notice' has specific legal implications regarding the process of termination. 'Consideration notice' is vague, potentially blurring the lines and leading to disputes over responsibilities regarding proper termination procedure.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law regarding proper notification for termination

perturbation.original_text: UTK shall not divulge to others, any trade secret or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of AVDU, obtained by UTK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, in writing by AVDU.
perturbation.changed_text: UTK shall not divulge to others, any private data or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of AVDU, obtained by UTK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, by AVDU.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'trade secret' and changing 'in writing' introduces ambiguity. 'Trade secret' has specific legal implications regarding the sharing of corporate data. The sharing can now be authorized without written approval from AVDU.
